wikipedia_page.main: Nicholas Arthur Frayling KStJ (born 29 February 1944) is a British Church of England priest. From September 2002 to February 2014, he served as the Dean of Chichester.

response: *  1944 – Nicholas Frayling, English priest and academic
The Dean of Chichester, the Very Revd Nicholas Frayling, added:
*2002–2014 Nicholas FraylingCathedral Website Announces retirement  Accessdate 14 April 2014

In November 2014 it was announced that he would succeed Nicholas Frayling as Dean of Chichester. He took up the post in February 2015: he was instituted on 14 February.Diocese of Chichester – Downing Street announces new Dean of Chichester Cathedral (Accessed 20 November 2014)

response: Trustees include France Jackson (Chairman), Lord Ramsbotham, Geoffrey Shields, Noel Wallace, Sarah Morton, Hilary Gal and John Stein (physiologist),  and . Former trustees include Hugh Montefiore, Henry Kitchener, 3rd Earl Kitchener, Baroness Greenfield and Nicholas Frayling.
